Courtside.Description: Seats right next to the action for an unparalleled game experience.
Courtside.View_Quality: Direct court-level view, engaging and immersive experience.
Courtside.Unique_Features: Chance for player interactions, possibility of being seen on TV.
Courtside.Accessibility: Easy access, but limited space for personal mobility devices.
Courtside.Special_Perks: Exclusive access to premium lounges, complimentary dining and beverages.

Club_Seats.Description: Premium seating offering a fantastic view of the game from the sides.
Club_Seats.View_Quality: Elevated side views with clear line of sight to the court.
Club_Seats.Unique_Features: Wider seats with more leg room, less crowded sections.
Club_Seats.Accessibility: Dedicated entrance for easier access, nearby elevators.
Club_Seats.Special_Perks: Access to exclusive clubs and in-seat wait service.

Terrace_Level.Description: Great overall view of the game from an elevated position.
Terrace_Level.View_Quality: Panoramic view of the court, ideal for enjoying the game.
Terrace_Level.Unique_Features: Affordable pricing for a comprehensive view of the action.
Terrace_Level.Accessibility: Accessible seating available, elevators to upper levels.
Terrace_Level.Special_Perks: Budget-friendly option with a full view of the court.

Plaza_Level.Description: Close to the action with a slightly elevated perspective.
Plaza_Level.View_Quality: Proximity to the court with great sightlines.
Plaza_Level.Unique_Features: Good balance of price, view, and experience.
Plaza_Level.Special_Perks: Excellent view points and convenient access to concessions.

restaurants_bars.name: B.B. Kings Blues Club
restaurants_bars.description: A renowned spot for live music and Southern cuisine, offering a vibrant atmosphere just steps from FedExForum.

restaurants_bars.name: The Majestic Grille
restaurants_bars.description: This former silent movie house now serves as a classic American eatery, known for its steak and seafood dishes.

restaurants_bars.name: Gus World Famous Fried Chicken
restaurants_bars.description: Famous for its spicy fried chicken, this casual diner is a must-visit for foodies and a short walk from the arena.

restaurants_bars.name: Silky OSullivans
restaurants_bars.description: An Irish pub known for its live goats and a diverse menu, including barbecue and seafood, perfect for a fun night out.

restaurants_bars.name: Blues City Cafe
restaurants_bars.description: Offers Memphis-style ribs, steaks, and catfish along with live blues music, encapsulating the spirit of Memphis.

restaurants_bars.name: Rendezvous
restaurants_bars.description: A historic Memphis barbecue joint located in a basement, famous for its dry-rubbed ribs that attract locals and tourists alike.

accommodations.name: The Westin Memphis Beale Street
accommodations.address: 170 Lt George W Lee Ave, Memphis, TN 38103
accommodations.description: Offers luxurious accommodations with modern amenities, located adjacent to FedExForum.

accommodations.name: Hotel Indigo Memphis Downtown
accommodations.address: 22 N B.B. King Blvd, Memphis, TN 38103
accommodations.description: A boutique hotel featuring unique designs inspired by the music and history of Memphis, within walking distance to FedExForum.

accommodations.name: Peabody Memphis
accommodations.description: Iconic hotel known for its charm and the famous Peabody Ducks, offering luxury stay and multiple dining options.

accommodations.name: Arrive Memphis
accommodations.description: A modern hotel with a focus on community and local culture, featuring comfortable rooms and a popular on-site bar and restaurant.

accommodations.name: Hilton Garden Inn Memphis Downtown
accommodations.description: Features comfortable rooms and suites, an indoor pool, and is conveniently located near FedExForum and Beale Street.

accommodations.name: The Central Station Memphis, Curio Collection by Hilton
accommodations.description: A beautifully renovated hotel in the historic Central Station building, offering unique rooms and a deep connection to the city's music culture.

tourist_attractions.name: Beale Street Historic District
tourist_attractions.description: One of the most iconic streets in America, known for its vibrant nightlife, live music, and cultural significance.

tourist_attractions.name: National Civil Rights Museum
tourist_attractions.description: Located at the former Lorraine Motel, where Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. was assassinated, this museum offers an immersive journey through the civil rights movement.

tourist_attractions.name: Graceland
tourist_attractions.description: The home of Elvis Presley, the King of Rock 'n' Roll, Graceland is one of the most visited private homes in America with tours of the mansion, exhibits, and the Elvis Presley Car Museum.

tourist_attractions.name: Memphis Zoo
tourist_attractions.description: Home to over 3,500 animals representing 500 species, the Memphis Zoo has been a staple of Overton Park for over 100 years and offers engaging exhibits and conservation programs.

tourist_attractions.name: Stax Museum of American Soul Music
tourist_attractions.description: Dedicated to preserving the legacy of Stax Records and American soul music, this museum houses more than 2,000 exhibits related to the genre's history.

tourist_attractions.name: Sun Studio
tourist_attractions.description: Known as the birthplace of rock 'n' roll, Sun Studio is a recording studio opened by Sam Phillips that discovered legends such as Elvis Presley, Johnny Cash, and Jerry Lee Lewis.

tourist_attractions.name: Shelby Farms Park
tourist_attractions.address: 6903 Great View Drive North, Memphis, TN 38134
tourist_attractions.description: One of the largest urban parks in America, offering a range of outdoor activities including biking, paddle boating, and zip lining across its 4,500 acres.

tourist_attractions.name: Mud Island River Park
tourist_attractions.description: Features a Riverwalk model of the Mississippi River, pedal boats, and a museum dedicated to the river's history and cultural significance.

team_related_activities.name: Grizzlies Den by Fanatics at FedExForum
team_related_activities.description: The official store for Memphis Grizzlies merchandise, offering a wide selection of jerseys, apparel, and accessories for fans of all ages. Located within the FedExForum, it's a must-visit for game-day gear.

team_related_activities.name: FedExForum Arena Tours
team_related_activities.description: Explore behind the scenes of the Grizzlies' home court. The tour offers fans an insider's look at the locker rooms, VIP areas, and the court itself. A great way to experience the arena beyond game day.

team_related_activities.name: Pre-Game Plaza Parties
team_related_activities.address: Outside FedExForum, 191 Beale St, Memphis, TN 38103
team_related_activities.description: Before select home games, the plaza outside FedExForum comes alive with music, games, and activities for fans of all ages. It's a great way to get into the spirit before heading in to watch the game.

options.description: The Memphis Trolley offers service along Main Street and the Riverfront, with stops convenient to FedExForum. It's a scenic and enjoyable way to explore downtown Memphis, with day passes available for unlimited rides.

Multiple MATA bus lines serve the downtown area, providing easy access to FedExForum from across the city. The 12, 13, and 40 lines have stops near the arena, with real-time tracking available on the MATA website.

Uber and Lyft operate extensively throughout Memphis, offering a convenient and flexible option for getting to and from FedExForum. Designated pickup and drop-off zones ensure a smooth experience on game days.

Explore Bike Share stations are located throughout downtown Memphis, offering a healthy and environmentally friendly way to get around. There's a station directly outside FedExForum, making it easy to bike to the game.

best_places_to_buy.name: Official Team Website
best_places_to_buy.description: The primary source for all ticket sales, offering guaranteed authenticity and the best seat selections. Check here first for promotions, season tickets, and single-game sales.

best_places_to_buy.name: Ticketmaster
best_places_to_buy.description: Authorized ticketing partner offering authentic Grizzlies tickets, including exclusive presales and verified resale tickets.

best_places_to_buy.name: StubHub
best_places_to_buy.description: Reliable secondary marketplace that offers verified resold Grizzlies tickets, often with competitive pricing for sold-out games.

best_places_to_buy.name: SeatGeek
best_places_to_buy.description: A user-friendly platform for buying and selling tickets to Grizzlies games, featuring interactive seating charts to find the perfect view.

best_places_to_buy.name: NBA Ticket Exchange
best_places_to_buy.description: The official NBA resale marketplace, offering a safe and secure platform for buying and selling tickets to all Grizzlies games.

ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Consider attending games on weekdays for potentially lower ticket prices. Explore group discounts or promotional nights for additional savings. Last-minute ticket deals can also offer savings.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Always buy tickets from official sources or reputable platforms to avoid scams. Be wary of deals that seem too good to be true and verify the authenticity of tickets when purchasing from secondary markets.
